title: Catalepsy hypnotic state: explanation & demonstration / Non-verbal hypnosis part 1
description:
Catalepsy is a hypnotic trance state, in which the subject's body becomes rigid and takes on any position. Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates this state with one of his students. Even after, she has chairs on her legs, she does not feel the weight, they are still cataleptic, as well as her hands. At Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, his students get to experience deep hypnotic states, and to learn important secrets, directly from Dr. Paret. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
